body.value:
{
  "pipeline_name": "@{pipeline().Pipeline}",
  "pipeline_id": "@{pipeline().RunId}",
  "status":"Failed",
  "data_factory_name":"@{pipeline().DataFactory}",
  "business_date": "@{pipeline().parameters.datetime}",
  "start_time": "@{formatDateTime(addhours(pipeline().TriggerTime,8),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}",
  "end_time": "@{formatDateTime(addhours(utcnow(),8),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss')}",
  "failure_info": "Move to Archive Notebook Job Failed",
  "emails": "@{pipeline().parameters.emails}"
}
